location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to Major Edward Ridley Colborne Bradford

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Bradford's request for Captain Burton to go to Kote Pootlee [Kotputli] on boundary duty, and the inconvenience this would cause to Pelly, and Pelly's suggestion that owing to the emergent work he needs Burton to do that Burton could meet Bradford in Sambhur [Sāmbhar] in October and visit Kote Pootlee en route.
